title: ninE nera namminu
sahitya:
ninnE nera namminAnu nIrajAkSa nannu brOvumu



anupallavi



 kanna kannavArini vEDu konnAnu phalamu lEdani nE



caraNam 1



 dAra tanayula udAra pUrNamu sEyu koraku dUra dEshamulanu sancAramu jEsi sAra 

mindaina lEka vEsAri I samsAra pArAvAramandu galugu phalamI dariyani telisi rAma

   

caraNam 2



 sancita karmamu tolaginci nannE vEL karuNinci brOcE deivamu nIvanucu yAcinci 

koncepu narula nutiyincanu nAvallanu gAdancunu dus-sangati cAlinci santatamu rAma

   

caraNam 3



 bhUtalamuna nokkari cEdi dhana-mapaharincu ghAtakula paralOka bhItiyu lEni pAtakula baTTi 

yama dUtalu goTTedi vELa brOtunani balka nevari cEta gAdani shrI rAma

   

caraNam 4



 endu niNDIyuNDE raghunandana vEga nA manasu nandu dalacina antAnandamai dOcE 

sundara vadana yOgi brnda vandita padAravinda yuga tyAgarAja vandanIya santatamu
